title: help me come up with a catch phrase
body:
I'm not gonna tell you the reason why because that would be on your terms and I only do things on my terms.  When am I going to tell you why?  Right now because I want to

Both of my grandpa's had things they'd say as a joke, like their own catch phrases.  One was saying okay with a funny inflection and combining the words "well" and "okay" as "w'okay".  He's also greet me and my siblings by saying Mr. before our first names.  He even did it two the girls just because it was dumb and funny.  My other grandpa's joke was randomly telling one of us kids "I'm gonna knock you out".  Sounds threatening?  It wasn't.  He was a kind man, and it always made us laugh.  He also always said he had the prettiest feet ever.  Also funny.

I wanna follow that tradition and come up with a phrase or two.  Halp
